titles.title: To support the goals of an annual National Time-Out Day to promote patient safety and optimal outcomes in the operating room.
To support the goals of an annual National Time-Out Day to promote patient safety and optimal outcomes in the operating room.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the goals and ideal of an annual National Time-Out Day as designated by the Association of periOperative Registered Nurses.
Congratulates perioperative nurses and representatives of surgical teams for working together to protect patient safety.
